backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling user profiles, access control, Stripe checkout/session operations, and booking-related types using storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature evidence listing deployment, domain-doc, and runbook features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, hooks, styling, and layout behavior across the application.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LOG_CAPTURE_TEMPLATE: Template for recording environment details and full stdout/stderr logs during build and deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTE_clearing-icp0-i: Diagnostic note template for capturing and troubleshooting production URL errors at clearing.icp0.io.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to buy a domain, configure DNS, and map it to the IC frontend canister with registrar comparisons.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and themes defining OKLCH-based color system, light/dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell that loads the React app and includes a build timestamp meta tag.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOY_CHECKLIST.md: Step-by-step production deployment checklist covering build, deploy, verification, custom-domain checks, and accessibility tests.
frontend/PRODUCTION_GO_LIVE_RUNBOOK.md: Structured runbook outlining prerequisites, pre-deployment checks, and environment validation for going live.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring themes, error handling, access gate, and all landing-page sections.
frontend/src/components/AccessCodeGate.t: Manual access-code gate component that unlocks content via session storage and provides copyable gate link.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard showing bookings and an availability tab, with permission checks and loading states.
frontend/src/components/BuildFailureDiag: Displays detailed build/deployment error diagnostics with copy-to-clipboard and dismissal controls.
frontend/src/components/EthicsAndBoundar: Section outlining ethical boundaries, disclaimers, and client responsibility expectations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding line, decorative dividers, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with layered celestial visuals, title, badge, and tagline.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: Checks for an invite secret in the URL or session storage and gates access, showing a locked screen until unlocked.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Displays a payment-cancelled message with guidance and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Shows a payment confirmation screen and optionally displays booking details parsed from URL parameters.
frontend/src/components/PractitionerAuth: Presents practitioner bio, headshot, and social links along with descriptive background text.
frontend/src/components/PriceAndValue.ts: Displays pricing for a session and explanatory text about the value and purpose of the work.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ReadinessQuiz.ts: Interactive readiness quiz that tallies yes/no answers and shows pass/fail results with booking links.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToBookCTA.t: Call‑to‑action section inviting users to book a session with a styled booking button.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper that adds spacing, backgrounds, motifs, and optional labels or dividers to sections.
frontend/src/components/SessionStructure: Outlines the four‑phase session structure using styled cards within a section wrapper.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/WhatItIs.tsx: Renders a section describing what The Clearing is, emphasizing its structure and what it is not through styled text and lists.
frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx: Displays an overview of what clients can expect from The Clearing, including goals, session flow, and clarifying-list items.
frontend/src/components/WhoThisIsFor.tsx: Defines who The Clearing is for and not for using two lists and includes a readiness quiz component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs like profiles, bookings, Stripe config, and checkout sessions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, typography rules, accessibility focus styles, and decorative gold/shimmer utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and imports global styles.
frontend/src/utils/captureAppErrors.ts: Implements a global error capture system that logs runtime and promise errors and allows subscribers to receive updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including OKLCH color variables, gold accent system, typography, spacing, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata detailing deployment status, features, and pending requests for production publishing and domain setup guidance.
